description: This easy Ethiopian-inspired vegan meal is loaded with flavor and easy to make!
name: Ethiopian Berbere Spiced Chickpeas and Polenta
recipeIngredient: 1 roll (18 oz. precooked polenta, cut into 1 inch slabs)
1-14 oz. can or 1 3/4 cups cooked chickpeas (rinsed and drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Coat a large skillet with 1/2 tablespoon of olive oil and place over medium-high heat.
Arrange polenta slabs in a single layer and cook about 5 minutes, until bottoms become crispy and begin to brown.
Gently flip and repeat on other side. Do this in batches if you don't have enough room.
Transfer polenta slabs to a plate and set aside.
